definition: surname Zha
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
see 山查[shan1 zha1]
surname Mu
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
inspection/to examine/to inspect/CL:次[ci4]
to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
to examine/to investigate/to censor out/censorship
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to detect/to investigate
to look over/to examine/to check up/to ferret out
random inspection/to do a spot check
to track down and seize (a criminal suspect, contraband etc)
to investigate and find out/to ascertain
to find out/to discover
to examine/to inspect
census/general survey/general investigation/reconnaissance survey

sentences.english: I'll call right now to find it out.
Males also sported two horns growing from the top of their skulls.
sentences.chinese: 男性查格里亚人还拥有两只从其头部长出的角。

sentences.english: Mr. Clinton flew to his home in Chappaqua, N. Y.
sentences.chinese: 随后克林顿搭机前往其在纽约查巴克的家。

sentences.english: I went to check the day Xinyi news, did not find relevant reports.
sentences.chinese: 我又去查了当天信宜新闻，没有发现相关报道。

sentences.english: You can get all the information there.
sentences.chinese: 在那里你可以查到所有的信息。

sentences.english: The next day, I looked up Asperger’s syndrome on Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 第二天我在维基百科上查了查阿斯伯格综合症。

sentences.english: I don't know how to spell the word; why don't you look it up in the dictionary?
sentences.chinese: 我不知道这个单词怎样拼，你为什么不去查一下词典？

sentences.english: In some counties, the actual layout of each person’s house is available online.
sentences.chinese: 在一些县，每户人家的实际布局都能在网上查到。

sentences.english: You 'd better consult the exposure meter if you are not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你算不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: I went looking for recent usages of the word crass.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，我查了查单词crass一些新近的用法。

sentences.english: It's five-day long since I have got your reply last time.
sentences.chinese: 每次上完课，老师抽一点时间给微凫查我的作业。

sentences.english: You'd better consult the exposure meter if you be not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你嘱不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: I checked to the investigation, " non-intervention " is no more than two perspectives in the United States one.
sentences.chinese: 我查了查，“不干预”无非是美国两派观点中的一派。

sentences.english: You can use this not only for a main URL but even to a specific page.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用来查某个主网址，甚至是某个特定的网页。

sentences.english: Why not look in the local paper?
sentences.chinese: 干吗不去查一下当地的报纸？

sentences.english: Could you find out whether there's a remittance for me from Guangzhou?
sentences.chinese: 能不能请您查一查是否有我的一笔自广州来的汇款？

to search

to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
material/resources/data/information/profile (Internet)/CL:份[fen4],個|个[ge4]
to investigate thoroughly
to look over/to examine/to check up/to ferret out
to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
